                Person newOwner,
                double balance)
        Edits the properties of an account
        Parameters:

        balance - new balance of the account

      • transfer

        void transfer(java.lang.String destID,
            java.lang.String sourceID,
            double amount)
        Transfers the specified amount from source account to destination account
        Parameters:
        destID - ID of the destination account
        sourceID - ID of the source account
        amount - amount of money to be transfered from source to destination
